org.jerkar.tool

Class JkBuild

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkBuild
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JkBuildDependencySupport

    public class JkBuild
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class defining commons tasks and utilities necessary for building any kind of project, regardless involved technologies.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      protected JkBuildPlugins plugins
      attached plugin instances to this build

      • init

        public void init()
        This method is invoked right after the option values has been injected to instance fields of this object.

      • buildDefDependencyResolver

        public JkDependencyResolver buildDefDependencyResolver()
        Returns the dependency resolver used to compile/run scripts of this project.

      • pluginTemplateClasses

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Class<java.lang.Object>> pluginTemplateClasses()
        Returns the classes accepted as template for plugins. If you override it, do not forget to add the ones from the super class.

      • setPlugins

        protected void setPlugins(java.lang.Iterable<?> plugins)
        Set the plugins to activate for this build. This method should be invoked after the #setBaseDir(File) method, so plugins can be configured using the proper base dir.

      • buildTimestamp

        public java.lang.String buildTimestamp()
        Returns the time-stamp this build has been initiated. Default is the time stamp (formatted as 'yyyyMMdd-HHmmss') this build has been instantiated.

      • buildTime

        protected java.util.Date buildTime()
        Returns the time the build was started.

      • toPath

        protected final JkPath toPath(java.lang.String pathAsString)
        Returns the specified relative path to this project as a JkPath instance.

      • baseDir

        public final JkFileTree baseDir()
        Returns the base directory for this project. All file/directory path are resolved from this directory.

      • execute

        public void execute(java.lang.Iterable<JkModelMethod> methods,

        Executes the specified methods given the fromDir as working directory.

        The output directory where all the final and intermediate artifacts are generated.

      • ouputDir

        public java.io.File ouputDir(java.lang.String relativePath)
        Returns the file located at the specified path relative to the output directory.

      • scaffold

        public final void scaffold()
        Creates the project structure (mainly project folder layout, build class code and IDE metadata) at the root of the current project.

      • scaffolder

        protected JkScaffolder scaffolder()
        Returns the scaffolder object in charge of doing the scaffolding for this build. Override this method if you write a template class that need to do custom action for scaffolding.

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Clean the output directory.

      • asDependency

        public JkComputedDependency asDependency(java.lang.Iterable<java.io.File> files)
        Returns a JkComputedDependency on this project and specified files. The 'doDefault' method will be invoked to compute the dependee files.

      • asDependency

        public JkComputedDependency asDependency(java.io.File... files)
        Returns a JkComputedDependency on this project and specified files. The 'doDefault' method will be invoked to compute the dependee files.

                                         java.io.File... files)

      • relativeProject

        public JkBuild relativeProject(java.lang.String relativePath)
        Returns the build of the specified slave project. Slave projects are expressed with relative path to this project.
